subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 27 matches at the China Open in Beijing with a 6-2, 6-2 win over John Isner in a quarterfinal.
snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 27 matches at the China Open in Beijing with a 6-2, 6-2 win over John Isner in a quarterfinal.
